dublin_core.dcvalue: The expansion of telemedicine nationwide has resulted in many states adopting specific telemedicine regulations to avoid the issue of requiring a full medical license to practice telemedicine How these laws and regulations relate to the practice of telepathology and teledermatology has not been well delineated It is important to understand these regulations to avoid potential judicial penalties arising from non compliance This article aims to outline state specific telemedicine regulations and penalties
Seminars in cutaneous medicine and surgery
Teledermatology, teledermatopathology, interstate dermatopathology and the law.
